title: Instagram : number of brand sponsored influencer posts 2016 to 2020
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Annual posts in millions, containing a total of 5 data points.
In general Annual posts in millions has rose over the Year.
Annual posts in millions is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2018, and finally roughly constant from 2018 to 2020.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Annual posts in millions, of value 6.12 was reached at Year 2020
Minimum Annual posts in millions about 1.26 was reached at Year 2016
